## **Come work with me!**

If you are interested in joining a recently-formed group and studying the evolution and dynamics of ancient domesticates with palaeogenomics - come work with me!

For those interested in writing a funding application for PhD (i.e. IRC) or postdoctoral funds (i.e. MCRA), please email me at kevin.daly[at]ucd.ie.
